entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text:
Dallas Mavericks team owner Mark Cuban blasts Congress for its failure to reach a deal on a coronavirus aid package so far, calling it “unconscionable.”

“Every single day there is delay, more businesses close, more people get fired or laid off and they’re not coming back.” https://t.co/c5mEq0hASO
